original_title: Never Too Late: The Doc Severinsen Story
overview: After three decades as the colorful bandleader to The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson, master trumpeter Doc Severinsen defies nature with a relentless schedule of touring, teaching and performing into his ninetiesâ€¦
tagline: "The best I can say about myself is that I might be a work in progress"
title: Never Too Late: The Doc Severinsen Story
